column5: What sort of negotitation room is there generally on a boat?  Say $30-$35k before taxes and fees?

Most manufacturers offer sales incentives to thier dealers, to sell new. Similar to automobiles, but maybe not as much. They may offer you freebies that you can turn into cash discounts.Just tell them to sharpen the pencil because you have money to spend.
Go with 15 percent. Try that and work from there.
